meanings.definition: The emergence of a baby or other young from the body of its mother.
meanings.sent1: The hospital celebrated the birth of a healthy baby boy.
meanings.sent2: Her sister's birth brought joy to the entire family.
meanings.sent3: The birth of a new puppy made the children ecstatic.
meanings.sent4: The birth of a new idea can change the world.
meanings.sent5: The birth of a star is a spectacular event in the universe.

meanings.definition: The beginning or coming into existence of something.
meanings.sent1: The birth of a friendship can happen in unexpected ways.
meanings.sent2: The birth of a new day brings hope and opportunities.
meanings.sent3: The birth of a plan requires careful thought and preparation.
meanings.sent4: The birth of a tradition can create lasting memories.
meanings.sent5: The birth of a dream starts with a single idea.
